title: I mistakenly purchased a ryze skin when I was just trying to see how much I would be left with.
body: I just want a refund I didn't want the Ryze skin since i already have one. I was just seeing how much rp I would be left with .

replies.body:
As *Rineyy* and *Telaura* mentioned, you can refund content by using a refund token. These tokens are a one-time offer on an account and if you've used all 3, there's no way to get more refund tokens. These tokens are meant to be used in these types of situations and are the only exception to our No refund policy. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

The problem is that you just took out that table that shows how much RP/IP you will have left. I have done this too, because its easier than whipping out a calculator, and ended up buying a skin i didn't want. Can you guys just put it back? There was absolutely no reason to have it taken out in the first place.

If you have never used a refund token you can go into your purchase history and refund that skin.  If you have are out of refund tokens your probably stuck with it unless a support rep can help you as a courtesy or something like that.

Unfortunately, there aren't any ways to gain additional refund tokens.

[See the refundables, see the non refundables.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ)
